page.title: 08INDUSTRY and EMPLOYMENT 2
page.content:
The Farmhouse Interview.
Today James and I went to Baynhall Farm to interview the farmer there,who is called Mr.Venables.He has been living there since 1942,he is married and has 2 children.He has got almost 400 acres and grows;potatoes,sugar,barley,onions,car rots and cereals.There isn't much water round his farm,so he has to irrigate his crops when it is dry. His hobbies are photography and squash but he isn't one of the most social members of the communtiy because he has to work on the farm most of the time.He goes to church every week and has got a lot of firends in the village.In his opinion housing development is the biggest change as the population ha grown from 800 in 1940 to now over 3000.
